mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey(surveyno, topic, startdate, enddate, poster, cnt, continueyn) VALUES(survey_seq.nextval, #{topic}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{poster}, #{cnt}, #{continueyn})
mapper.select:
SELECT surveyno, topic, startdate, enddate, poster, cnt, continueyn, word FROM survey
WHERE (topic LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR poster LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%')
ORDER BY surveyno DESC
